description: Integration of the fused dot product of posits of the Universal library into the Eigen library.
references: G. Guennebaud, B. Jacob, et al. Eigen v3. http://eigen.tuxfamily.org. 2010.
E. T. L. Omtzigt et al. "Universal Numbers Library: design and implementation of a high-performance reproducible number systems library". In: arXiv:2012.11011 (2020).
